presentation package¶

Submodules¶

presentation.ERPresentation module¶

presentation.ERPresentation.create_er_html(relations)¶

This function create entity-relationship html.

Args:
relations (list): List of (FieldPath FieldPath)
Returns:
Html str.

A way might be used is

>>> print create_structure_ers_from_relations([(FieldPath('db', 'ac', 'id'), FieldPath('db', 'bc', 'id'))])
presentation.ERPresentation.create_structure_ers_from_relations(relations)¶

This function gets structured entity relationship.

Args:
relations (list): List of (FieldPath FieldPath)
Returns:
Structured ER dict. For example: {‘database_name’: {‘table_name’: {‘field_name’: [‘foreign_database_table_field’]}}

A way might be used is

>>> print create_structure_ers_from_relations([(FieldPath('db', 'ac', 'id'), FieldPath('db', 'bc', 'id'))])
{'db': {'ac': {'id': ['db.bc.id']}, {'bc': {'id': ['db.ac.id']}}}}
